name: Sniper Shooter Animal Safari 3
description:
Sniper Shooter Animal Safari 3D is all about thrill & fun. Wild animals are very smart and clever so to be a professional forest wild animal hunter you must have good aim and shooting skills while holding your breath and kill them.
Features:

• First person jungle sniper hunting.
• Smooth and efficient weapon control.
• Realistic animal and deer hunting games graphics.
• World’s most advanced sniper with accurate scope focus and magazine.
• Realistic 3D environment of beautiful woodland.
• Ultra High definition (HD) display.
